post_content:
1909 T206 Chesbro-some minor corner wear. A spot on the back above the "e" and "d" in "Piedmont." There is NO spot below the "U" in "QUALITY." That is my scanner. $400.00. (Sold)

S/h is $5.65 outside of California, Oregon, the state of Washington and Arizona. The s/h to those states is $6.05. Hawaii and Alaska are greater.

If paying by PayPal, please pay by PayPal Gift/Friends and Family to [url]wizard15243@yahoo.com[/url].
A+ for customer service.  Responds to emails 24 hours a day.  Hall of Fame caliber seller.
